title: Understanding Medical Aid in Dying
text: Medical aid in dying involves a physician's role in assisting a patient to end their life. Consider the ethical and legal aspects involved.

title: Voluntary and Competent Request
text: The process requires the individual to make a voluntary and competent request. What does this imply about the individual's state of mind?

hintAnswer: intentional assistance provided by a physician to enable an individual to end their own life by furnishing drugs for $$self-administration$$, always at the voluntary and competent request of the individual involved
title: Role of the Physician
text: What is the role of the physician in medical aid in dying?
choices: Intentionally ending a life to prevent further pain and suffering
